availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John G. Morrison (Scott County, Kentucky, judge and private banker)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, judge and private banker. Ohio native. Married to Nancy Buford Johnson Morrison on September 1, 1836. Father of Helen S. Morrison, Nancy J. Morrison, Adelaide Morrison, and John W. Morrison. Judge of Scott County Court in Scott County in 1860. Owned eighteen enslaved persons in Scott County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, Georgetown, p. 1006.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, District 1, p. 16.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Scott County, Georgetown, p. 234B.
"John G. Morrison (unknown-1884)," Find A Grave, Memorial #99164909, accessed May, 31, 2017, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/99164909.
